job.title: Software Engineer c# .Net (with Azure)
job.description: <p><strong><u>Project Description:</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p>Tax and Accounting group within the client. The mission of this engagement is to improve reliability, availability and performance of the flagship produce - CCH Axcess.</p><p>Axcess is a product suite made out of number of products that serve the accounting clients. </p><p>The clients of company that use this product are the accountants and accounting firms.</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Responsibilities:</u></strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>- Perform analysis and Design, transform high-level design into low-level design, and implementation.</li><li>- To collaborate with an agile team that is passionate about utilizing emerging technologies and delivering high quality and timely code.</li><li>- Good understanding and experience following design patterns, test-driven development and continuous integration practices</li><li>- Build automated, scalable services and systems to power our growing Azure cloud infrastructure</li><li>- Software prototyping and construction - Design, Build, and Modify existing business tier components, Web applications, and database objects using Microsoft platform technologies (.NET Web API) and Azure.</li><li>- Work with Quality Assurance Team on issue reporting, resolution, and change control</li><li>- Support and Troubleshooting - Assist Operations Team with any environment issues during application deployment across Development, QA, Staging, and Production environments.</li><li>- Assist other cross teams with troubleshooting problems that may arise from applications or integration of various components.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Skills Description:</u></strong></p><ul><li>C# .Net, ASP .Net, TFS, Git, Cloud Experience (Azure, GCP, AWS), Solid experience building REST APIs</li></ul><p></p>
